title: My neice
subject_group: Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Children - Family relationships

abstract: 'It is important for me to be an aunty, it makes me feel responsible'.
description: Samantha Sharp may have become an aunty early in her life but she's glad she is. She plays with her niece in the way that older aunts couldn't and she cherishes the time they spend together.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Title; B2002108; Western stories : expressions for the future : Digital Storytelling project; Active; Jul 2007
